div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 08:35 am CDT

div.div: A slight chance of showers before noon, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 74. South southeast wind 7 to 13 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a slight chance of showers between 10pm and 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. South southeast wind 5 to 10 mph becoming north in the evening. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. North wind 5 to 7 mph becoming calm in the afternoon.
